name: Keturi
description:
Please fill out this short feedback form about the game so that I can learn and grow!

The kind of feedback I'm looking for is about the mechanics of the card game itself. This is a very very early version, so things like animations and more varied cards will come later. I just want to know if it's fun enough that people would like to see me keep working on it.

Known bugs:

  • The black box around the card preview pane is not supposed to be there.
